meta_description: The Newport art museum is home to over 2600 works of art. The museum displays, and rotates, its permanent collection throughout several of its galleries.
hours_text:

### 

[ Plan Your Visit -> ](/web/20251117061705/https://newportartmuseum.org/visit)

**Newport Art Museum

####  Admission 

#### 

####  Museum Members 

####  Free 

####  Adults 

####  $15 

####  Seniors (65+) 

####  $10 

####  College Students 

####  $8 

####  Active Military (+ Spouse) 

####  Free 

####  Ages 17 & under 

####  Free 

####  Hours 

####  Monday 

####  11 am - 4 pm 

####  Tuesday 

####  Closed 

####  Wednesday - Saturday 

####  11 am - 4 pm 

####  Sunday 

####  11 am - 4 pm 

####  Holidays 

####  The Museum is closed New Year's Day, Easter Sunday, Thanksgiving Day, and Christmas Day.
